publication.abstract: Â© 2015 The Author. All rights reserved. INSECT is a user-friendly web server to predict the occurrence of Cis-Regulatory Modules (CRMs), which control gene expression. Here, we present a new release of INSECT which includes several new features, such as whole genome analysis, nucleosome occupancy predictions, and which provides additional links to third-party functional tools that complement user capabilities, CRM analysis and hypothesis construction. Improvements in the core implementation have led to a faster and more efficient tool. In addition, this new release introduces a new interface designed for a more integrative and dynamic user experience.
publication.title: INSECT 2.0: A web-server for genome-wide cis-regulatory modules prediction

summary.description: Easy-to-use and powerful web server for biologists analysing genomic sequence data for in silico cis-regulatory modules prediction and analysis.
summary.name: INSECT
